price: prej Faraonit, që ishte tiran, njeri që kalonte çdo kufi të së keqes.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
